channel.title: Alexeven on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Alexeven on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Do you speak PrestaShop? – August 2017 edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it’s also about taking part in the PrestaShop translation project! This report tells you how the translations of the software evolved in August.

item.title: Some resources to help you with the translation of PrestaShop
item.description: PrestaShop is quite a large open translation project and as a new translation contributor, you may wonder where to start. You’ll find here all you need to know to help with the translation of our e-commerce software, and a few tips to get you started. Thanks for your help!

item.title: Do you speak PrestaShop? – July 2017 edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it’s also about taking part to the PrestaShop translation project! Read this report to see how the translations of the software evolved in July.

item.title: An update on the 1.7 RTL project
item.description: Some time ago we announced the launch of a project to better adapt PrestaShop to right-to-left (RTL) languages. We already have a small community overviewing what is going on (thank you!). To make sure everybody shares the same level of information, here is where we stand so far.

item.title: Do you speak PrestaShop? – June 2017 edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it’s also about taking part to the PrestaShop translation project! Read this report to see how the translations of the software evolved in June.

item.title: 1.7.2 is ready for translation
item.description: As you might have guessed, PrestaShop 1.7.2 is on its way, and with it some new strings are coming too. We’ve just updated the Crowdin project to add the strings that appeared since v1.7.1.0: PrestaShop 1.7.2 is now open for translation!

item.title: Do you speak PrestaShop? – May 2017 edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it’s also about taking part to the PrestaShop translation project! Read this report to see how the translations of the software evolved in May.

item.title: Do you speak PrestaShop? – April 2017 edition
item.description: Contributing to PrestaShop is not only about the code, it’s also about taking part to the PrestaShop translation project! Read this report to see how the translations of the software evolved in April.

item.title: Do you speak PrestaShop? – March 2017 edition
item.description: More and more languages are available on PrestaShop 1.7 thanks to the help of the community on the PrestaShop translation project! Read this report to see how the project evolved in March.

item.title: How to translate your theme in PrestaShop 1.7
item.description: By now you’re probably aware that the 1.7 version comes with a new translation system and that the theme you are building can benefit from it. However, we didn’t give much details on how it works yet, so here is what you should know if you want to translate your theme for PrestaShop 1.7.

item.title: What's new regarding translations in PrestaShop 1.7.1.0
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.1.0 has been shipped with several new features to improve internationalization and localization. Here is a short tour of what’s new and how it makes things better for you, both as a merchant and a translator!

item.title: Making PrestaShop RTL-compliant together with you
item.description: As an editor of a free software translated in many languages, our wish has always been that merchants from anywhere around the world could be able to sell easily thanks to PrestaShop.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.1.0 is available!
item.description: Many of you have been waiting for it: PrestaShop 1.7.1.0 is now available, and it is all you’ve ever wanted v1.7 to be!

item.title: Do you speak PrestaShop? – February 2017 edition
item.description: With 1.7.1 version soon to be released, there has been some activity on the PrestaShop translation project last month. And that comes with good news for translators too!

item.title: 1.7.1 is ready for translation
item.description: As you’ve heard, PrestaShop 1.7.1 is on its way, and with it some new strings are coming too. We’ve just updated the Crowdin project to add the strings that appeared since v1.7.0.0: PrestaShop 1.7.1 is now open for translation!
